power.title: Devastating Strike
power.fluff: You strike with awesome power, more concerned with offensive strength than defensive posturing
power.section: Attack:Meleeweaponone creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit:1[W] + Strength modifier + 1d10 damage.
true1 Level 11:1[W] + Strength modifier + 2d10 damage.
true 1 Level 21:2[W] + Strength modifier + 3d10 damage.

true 1 Raging:While you are raging, you can reroll any damage die result of 1 until the die shows 2 or higher. For d10s and d12s, you can reroll any damage die result of 1 or 2 until the die shows a 3 or higher.
true 1 If you can already reroll the damage die, roll twice and take the higher result for that die.
Effect:Until the start of your next turn, attacks against you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll.

power.title: Foe to Foe
power.fluff: Slaying your foe fills you with the rush of battle, allowing you to cut your way from one foe to the next with greater ease
power.section: Attack:Meleeweaponone creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit:1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Level 21:2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

true If you have reduced at least one non-minion enemy to 0 hit points during this encounter, this attack deals an additional 1d8 damage, or an additional 2d8 damage if you reduced a non-minion enemy to 0 hit points since the start of your previous turn.
true 1 Level 11:2d8 or 3d8 additional damage.
true 1 Level 21:3d8 or 5d8 additional damage.
Effect (Raging): While you are raging, if you reduced a minion enemy to 0 hit points, you can move up to one-half your speed to a space adjacent to an enemy.
If you reduced a non-minion enemy to 0 hit points or less, you can move up to your speed to a space adjacent to an enemy.

true Hit:1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.
